steps.name: the user navigates to home for checkout "https://www.automationexercise.com/"
the home page should visible successfully for checkout

elements.name: Complete checkout process with account creation

steps.name: the user adds products to cart for checkout
the user clicks on Cart button for checkout
the user verifies that cart page is displayed for checkout
the user clicks on Proceed To Checkout button
the user clicks on Register Login button for checkout
user should see signup "New User Signup!" for checkout
the user enters name as "Supriya" and email as "supriyaa6@example.com" for checkout
the user should see the "Enter Account Information" for checkout
the user fills the details for signup for checkout
the user should see the message "Account Created!" for checkout
click on continue button for checkout
the user should see the message username "Logged in as Supriya" for checkout
the user clicks on Cart button for checkout
the user clicks on Proceed To Checkout button
Verify Address Details and Review Your Order
Enter description in comment text area and click Place Order
Click Pay and Confirm Order button
the user should see the message 'Your order has been placed successfully!' for checkout
delete the account for checkout
click on continue button after deleting the account for checkout
the user should see the message deleted "Account Deleted!" for checkout
